objects.text: • ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLING • 20H BATTERY • SPATIAL AUDIO

product_details.name: Apple AirPods Max Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Active Noise Cancelling, Transparency Mode, Personalized Spatial Audio, Dolby Atmos, Bluetooth Headphones for iPhone – Pink
product_details.description: Headphones Jack: Lightning. Model Name: AirPods Max. Connectivity Technology: Wireless, Wired. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth, NFC. Age Range (Description): Adult. Material: memory foam. Specific Uses For Product: Music. Recommended Uses For Product: Calling, Recording, Exercising, Gaming, Disc Jockey Use. Compatible Devices: Cellphones, Tablets, Telephones, Music Production Equipment, Laptops, Desktops. Theme: TV Series. Control Type: Call Control, Media Control, Volume Control, Voice Control, Noise Control. Cable Feature: Detachable. Item Weight: 13.6 ounces. Water Resistance Level: Not Water Resistant. Unit Count: 1.0 Count. Style: Lightning. Control Method: Touch. Number of Items: 1. Battery Life: 20 Hour. Product Dimensions: 9.43 x 9.57 x 3.15 inches. Language: English, English, English, English, English. Batteries: 2 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included).

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and bold promotional design centered around a high-end audio product. The background uses a radial navy-to-deep-blue gradient enriched with subtle circular accents and curved lines, creating depth and visual flow. A white inner circle framed with red orange highlights the product image centrally. A large, coral-colored heading (`heading`) draws immediate attention at the top, followed by a crisp white subheading (`subheading`) promoting a deal. The bright price tag (`price`) is placed inside a striking red circular badge overlapping the product zone. At the bottom, a bold tagline (`tagline`) and detailed features (`description`) complete the information. A red CTA button (`cta_background` + `cta`) encourages action.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #2A4365
- Deep Blue: #1A365D
- Coral Pink: #FEB2B2
- Red Orange: #E53E3E
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases headphones in a visually striking color palette of soft pink and vibrant red tones, creating a modern and stylish aesthetic. The main earcup body features a metallic blush pink finish (#E8A9B9), lending a premium and elegant touch. The mesh cushioning is a gradient of coral red and pink (#EB5A61 blending into #F6B5B5), seamlessly transitioning with a subtle texture that complements the sleek aluminum shell. The headband is a vibrant vermilion red (#E63946), contrasted with chrome accents (#C0C0C0) for sophistication. This dynamic but harmonious palette enhances visual appeal and can be carried into an ad banner for youthful, energetic branding.
